Package com.team7.cmput301.android.theirisproject.activity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AddBodyLocationDialogFragment.AddBodyLocationDialogListener  
    AddGeoLocationDialogFragment.AddGeoLocationDialogListener  
    AddPatientDialogFragment.AddPatientDialogListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBodyLocationDialogFragment
    AddBodyLocationDialogFragment creates a dialog to click on selected bodyphoto to set a point on the image.
    AddBodyPhotoActivity
    AddBodyPhotoActivity is an form activity that allows user to add their body photo for the records to map to
    AddGeoLocationDialogFragment
    Dialog fragment that confirms with the user if the selected location is the location to set for the record
    AddPatientDialogFragment
    AddPatientDialogFragment is responsible for getting the Care Provider's input of an email, which it then tells its controller to go search the database for that Patient and gives its hosting activity the new list of Patients to display if updated.
    AddProblemActivity
    AddProblemActivity is a form to add an activity, by click on submit we are sending a Problem object to our database to be stored (handle offline by storing it in local json).
    AddRecordActivity
    AddRecordActivity is a form to add an activity
    BodyPhotoListActivity
    BodyPhotoListActivity is an activity to view the users body photos to be used in records
    ContactDialogFragment
    ContactDialogFragment is a dialog to show the contact information of a user
    ContactsActivity
    ContactsActivity is used to host ContactsFragment, which in turn is used to help import Patients for a logged-in Care Provider
    ContactsFragment
    ContactsFragment is a Fragment that displays a list of Contacts that the logged-in Care Provider has in their Contacts app, all the Contacts of which are registered Patients in Iris.
    DatePickerFragment
    Allows for date editing.
    DeleteProblemActivity
    DeleteProblemActivity confirms with the user of deletion of selected problem If yes, then problem will be deleted.
    EditProblemActivity
    Activity that is used to edit the problem selected by the user Uses ProblemController to get problem selected from the database and EditProblemController to submit the edited problem to the database.
    EditProfileActivity
    EditProfileActivity is used to allow a User to edit their profile information.
    EditRecordActivity
    Activity for editing a single Record.
    IrisActivity<M>
    A type of Activity that uses a IrisController to interact with and update with a Model object,
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity is our landing page for the user to authenticate before they are able to access the applications core features
    MapActivity
    MapActivity is used to display a map, letting the user add a marker for a geolocation (when called by AddRecordActivity), or see the location(s) of record(s) (when called by ViewProblemActivity or ViewRecordActivity.
    PatientListActivity
    PatientListActivity is the screen which shows a Care Provider all their registered Patients.
    ProblemListActivity
    ProblemListActivity shows the problems of a given user through the intent extra "user"
    ProblemSlideshowActivity
    Activity that displays a slideshow for all of the record photos associated with a problem Reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q2FPDI99-as
    RecordListActivity
    Activity for viewing and clicking all Records for a Patient
    RegisterActivity
    Activity that is used to help registerUser new users into the database Uses its designated controller, RegisterController to handle the updating of the database
    SearchActivity
    SearchActivity is an activity to search for problems or records based on keyword given in input field.
    SplashActivity
    Used to display a splash screen to the user.
    TransferCodeDialogFragment
    TransferCodeDialogFragment shows the transfer code for the currently logged in user.
    ViewImageFragment
    ViewImageFragment is a dialog to show an enlarged photo of the one pressed in ImageListAdapter
    ViewProblemActivity
    Activity that is used to view the problem selected by the user Uses ProblemController to get problem selected from the database
    ViewProfileActivity
    ViewProfileActivity is for allowing the user to view their profile information.
    ViewRecordActivity
    ViewRecordActivity used to view a record
